short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove ads from Twitter periodically. The extension removes tweets, users, and trends that are marked as ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simply removes annoying ads from Twitter, in fact AdBlock and UBlockOrigin do not remove ads on Twitter, instead use the Twitter Ads Blocker extension to find a clean timeline.

Usage :

1. Install
2. It's done âœ¨

FAQ :

- Q : When does the twitter ads are removed
- A : Every 10 seconds on the twitter.com domain

- Q : Is the extension is safe, can I check the source code
- A : Of course ! The webextension is open-source and available on Github https://github.com/MatteoGauthier/twitter-ads-blocker . Contribution are welcomed
